item.description: PyQuery 初始化 %%html <div id = "container"> <ul class="list"> <li class = "item-0">frist item</li> <li class = "item-1"><a href="link2.html">second item</a></li> <li class = "item-0 active"><a href="link3.html" style="color:black;"><span class="bold">third item</span></a></li> <li class = "item-1 active"><a href="link4.html">fourth item</a></li> <li class = "item-0"><a href="link5.html">fifth item</a></li> </ul> </div> 字符串初始化 html = ''' <div id = "container"> <ul class="list"> <li class = "item-0">frist item</li> <li class = "item-1"><a href="link2.html">second item</a></li> <li class = "item-0 active"><a href="link3.
